AboutSection.title: About
paragraphs: I have been programming for almost two years. In 2023, I heard about Python and, for a few days, I played around in the IDE. Actually, I was interested in the web and wanted a radical change. So I started with the basics and discovered JS.

In order to study, I took a break from work and started to develop some personal projects. In 2024, with a group of friends and acquaintances (engineers, designers, copywriters), I collaborated on a few products, always experimenting with technologies, learning, contributing, confronting myself.
Now I want a new opportunity. Basically, I want to start my career.
